Package simulation.montecarlo

Class ObservableExtractor

java.lang.Object
simulation.montecarlo.ObservableExtractor
public class ObservableExtractor extends Object
Extracts measurement from a Lattice object

  • Constructor Details

    • ObservableExtractor

      public ObservableExtractor​(double[][] k_cos_table, double[][] k_sin_table)
      Constructs a new ObservableExtractor object
      Parameters:
      k_cos_table - table with cos(k.R) for each site R in each direction k (k_x,k_y,k_z)
      k_sin_table - table with sin(k.R) for each site R in each direction k (k_x,k_y,k_z)

  • Method Details

    • meanField

      public static double[] meanField​(singleSpin[] arr)
      Calculates the mean (over the lattice) magnetic fields and their standard deviations
      Parameters:
      arr - the lattice array
      Returns:
      an array of means and standard deviations of Bx, By and Bz in the format: [E[Bx>],std(Bx),E[By],std(By),E[Bz],std(Bz),maxB_transverse,maxB_long]

    • calc_mk2

      public double[] calc_mk2​(singleSpin[] arr)
      Calculates the k-space magnetization squared for k_min used for the finite-size correlation length See, e.g. Andresen et al. (2013) PRL: https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevLett.111.177202
      Parameters:
      arr - array of spins
      Returns:
      length 3 array with |m(k_min)|^2 for k_min in each of the spatial directions x,y,z

    • calcMagnetization

      public static double calcMagnetization​(singleSpin[] arr)
      Calculates the total magnetization of the system
      Parameters:
      arr - the spin system
      Returns:
      the (normalized) magnetization

    • calcEnergy

      public static double calcEnergy​(Lattice lattice)
      Calculates the total energy of the system
      Parameters:
      lattice - the lattice whose energy should be calculated

    • calcExchangeEnergy

      public static double calcExchangeEnergy​(Lattice lattice)
      Calculates only the energy due to exchange interactions. Not used since exchange interactions are already embedded in the standard interactions table
      Parameters:
      lattice - the lattice whose energy should be calculated
      Returns:
      the energy of the system due only to exchange interactions

    • calcSpinSizes

      public static double[] calcSpinSizes​(singleSpin[] arr)
      Calculate mean and standard deviation of the magnetic moment size over the lattice
      Parameters:
      arr - the lattice array
      Returns:
      array of length 2 which holds the spin size mean and the spin size std.

    • countTransverseFieldMaximizingNNConfigs

      public static double countTransverseFieldMaximizingNNConfigs​(Lattice lattice)
      Calculates the fraction of spins whose 4 nearest neighbors are oriented in one of the configurations that maximize the local transverse field on those spins. These configurations are ones where for each of the two pairs of spins that share a common plane (which also includes the z axis), both spins are oriented opposite to one another. The identification of such configurations relies on the order of neighbors in lattice.nnArray
      Parameters:
      lattice - the lattice object
      Returns:
      the fraction of such spins out of the total number of spins.
